sentence.Network_en: The ballot was re-run on Mr Todd's insistence after accusations of malpractice.
sentence.Network_cn: 因被控舞弊，在托德先生的坚持下重新进行了投票。

sentence.Network_en: She had attended an interview, at her boyfriend's insistence.
sentence.Network_cn: 在男友的坚持下，她去参加了一个面试。

sentence.Network_en: their insistence on strict standards of behaviour
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对严格行为规范的坚决主张

PerfectNetExp.abs: On his insistence , the two - team leaders were executed., 在他的坚持下 , 这两个队长被处死.
stubborn a．顽固的，坚决的insistence n．坚持，执着compromise n．妥协，和解，折衷
insipid adj．乏味的，枯燥的insistence n．坚持，强求insolent adj．粗野的，无礼的

we must design our applications to believe that a user will enter what he means to enter and if a user wants to correct things , he will do so without paranoid insistence .我们必须训练程序相信，用户输入的是他希望输入的内容。如果用户希望改正，他会那样做，而无须我们狂妄地坚持。

list.abs: Building would not , he insisted , be frozen anywhere in Jerusalem ., 他坚称不会冻结在耶路撒冷任何地方的建设工程.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... existent 存在的，现存的 insistent 坚持的 emergent 紧急的.
日常英语 - 豆丁网 ... inorganic a. 无生物的；无机的 insistent a. 坚持的；逼人注意的 inspiration n. 灵感；妙想；鼓舞.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... existence n 存在，生存 insist v 坚持；硬要 insistence n 坚持；强调.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... inside prep. 在……里面 insist vi. 坚持；坚决认为 inspect vt. 检查；检验；审视.

entry.def: Someone's insistence on something is the fact that they insist that it should be done or insist that it is the case.

example.ex: ...Raeder's insistence that naval uniform be worn...
example.tran: 雷德坚决要求穿海军制服

example.ex: He admired your insistence on understanding things and making your point, even when he preferred his own...
example.tran: 他敬佩你弄清楚问题、说服别人接受你的主张的那份坚持,即便有时他更倾向于自己的见解。

means.word_mean: 2. the state of urgently demanding notice or attention;

sentences.sentence: "he pressed his demand with considerable instancy"

auth_sentence.content: So why the stubborn insistence on passing health reform?
auth_sentence.res_content: So why the stubborn insistence on passing health reform?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So why the stubborn insistence on passing health reform?

auth_sentence.content: His insistence on hiring only Christians can feel discriminatory.
auth_sentence.res_content: His insistence on hiring only Christians can feel discriminatory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His insistence on hiring only Christians can feel discriminatory.

auth_sentence.content: I also liked his insistence and his sense of urgency.
auth_sentence.res_content: I also liked his insistence and his sense of urgency.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I also liked his insistence and his sense of urgency.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+resistible可抗拒的→adj.不可抗拒的
persist[v.坚持]+ent表形容词→adj.固执的,坚持的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ent表形容词→adj.抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ible可..的→adj.可抵抗的
assist[v.帮助]+ant人→n.助手,助教;辅助物
consist[v.[in]在于,存在于;[of]由…组成,由…构成]+ence表名词→n.坚固性,浓度

stems_affixes.value_cn: 存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
stems_affixes.word_buile: exist[v.存在;生存;生活]+ence表名词→n.存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
insist[v.[on]坚持要求,坚决主张,坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持,强求
persist[v.坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持, 持续
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ance表名词→n.[to]抵抗,反抗;抵抗力,阻力;电阻
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ence表名词→n.抵抗力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生存, 生活, 留存
stems_affixes.word_buile: subsist[v.生存,存在,供养]+ence表名词→n.生存, 生活, 留存
as加强动作+sist站→站过来→帮助
con共同+sist站立→站到一起→帮助
de加强+sist站立→站着不动→停止
in加强+sist站立→坚定地站立
per始终+sist站→站到最后→坚持
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
sub下面+sist站立→站下去,活下去
con共同+flu流+ence性质,状态→共同流在一起→汇流

stems_affixes.value_cn: 依靠,依赖;信任,信赖;隶属
stems_affixes.word_buile: depend依靠+ence性质,状态→n.依靠,依赖;信任,信赖;隶属
de去掉+spond诺言+ence性质,状态→n.沮丧,悲观
in不+depend依靠+ence性质,状态→n.独立,自主
infer推论+ence性质,状态→n.推论
in无+noc害+ence表名词→n.无害,天真,无罪
insist坚持+ence性质,状态→n.坚持,强求
neg没有+lig选择+ence性质,状态→没有选出→疏忽
revere尊敬,敬畏,崇敬+ence性质,状态→reverence
sil+ence性质,状态→n.静,寂静,沉默,静默
trucul凶猛+ence性质,状态→n.凶猛,粗暴

Sentence.sentence: His insistence on putting users first, and focusing on elegance and simplicity, has become deep-rooted in his own company, and is spreading to rival firms too.

sentences.en: insistence by the government that 25% of all household waste be recycled
sentences.cn: 政府方面坚持25% 的家庭垃圾应该回收

sentences.en: Her parents were united in their insistence that she go to college.
sentences.cn: 她的父母亲一致坚持认为她应该上大学。

sentences.en: The union has dropped its earlier insistence that workers should receive bonus payments.
sentences.cn: 工会起先坚持工人应当得到奖金，但是现在已经不再坚持了。
